personal.name: Anugrah Tribima!
personal.title: Full-Stack Developer
personal.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer
personal.location: Kota Administrasi Jakarta Selatan, DKI Jakarta
personal.bio: A Fullstack Developer with 2+ years of experience, quick to adapt, and focused on building efficient solutions. Familiar with system integration, server management, and modern architecture. Eager to grow with a dynamic team and continuously learn along the way.

projects.title: Company Profile Website
projects.description: A responsive company profile website built using React.js and Bootstrap. The site is optimized for basic SEO and designed to provide a clean, accessible interface across devices.

projects.title: CEISA 4.0
projects.description: Worked on backend development for multiple modules in CEISA 4.0 (Bea Cukai), including the Internal Fund Management and Document Realization modules. Used Java Spring Boot and PostgreSQL in a microservices setup. Contributions included restoring in-house treasury services, developing a scheduler for document blocking processes, and enhancing monitoring APIs. Collaborated regularly with frontend developers and system analysts to ensure smooth implementation, with tasks managed via Jira.

projects.title: Enesis Integarted System
projects.description: Developed and maintained the Enesis Integrated System (EIS) using Laravel, Vue.js, and Node.js. Handled data integration from SOAP-based services and built support tools for managing EIS master data effectively.

projects.title: ETLE Nasional
projects.description: Contributed to the ETLE Nasional project by Korlantas Polri, which centralized regional ETLE systems into a national platform. I was involved in the technical development of supporting systems, such as log processing tools for violation data using Python and SQLite, as well as real-time dashboards to monitor camera and server status. I also collaborated during the integration of Hikvision TP-50 cameras across regions, provided technical support to users, and helped with basic server management tasks when needed.

projects.title: Letter Management System
projects.description: A web-based application designed to replace manual, paper-based letter tracking within a company. This system enables digital logging of incoming and outgoing letters, centralized data management through an admin dashboard, and automatic reporting. As the sole developer, I built the entire system from scratch ‚Äî including database design, backend and frontend development, and deployment to the company‚Äôs production server.

experience.description: Lead backend development for high-traffic applications, mentor junior developers, and architect scalable solutions.
Built the entire tech stack from scratch, implemented CI/CD pipelines, and scaled the platform to handle 1M+ users.
Developed web applications, collaborated with design teams, and learned best practices in software development.
